snippet: The university released a document this week that includes a series of sketches in which characters navigate sexual encounters, sometimes respecting each other’s right to consent, and sometimes not.
abstract: Yale University releases document that details eight hypothetical situations in which fictional students navigate sexual encounters, in effort to clarify both morality of certain situations and university's sexual misconduct policies; each narrative is followed by explanation of whether actions described violate school's code.
lead_paragraph: The university released a document this week that includes a series of sketches in which characters navigate sexual encounters, sometimes respecting each other’s right to consent, and sometimes not.

headline.main: Yale Tries to Clarify What Sexual Misconduct Is in a New Guide
headline.print_headline: Yale Guide Tries to Clarify the Meaning and Penalties of Sexual Misconduct
